# addAnimations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified animation block to the animator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAnimations(_ animations: @escaping () -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **animations**: The animation block.

## Adding Custom Animations

- **addCompletion(_:)**: Adds the specified completion block to the animator.
